summary.Title: Business Development Coordinator for Bjarke Ingels Group - BIG

summary.Presentation: Our Copenhagen office is looking for a Business Development Coordinator, Nordics, native speaker at least one Scandinavian language (Danish, Swedish or Norwegian).

WorkPlace.Name: B.I.G. BJARKE INGELS GROUP ApS
WorkPlace.Description: BIG is a group of 500+ architects, engineers, urbanists, inventors, researchers and business minds from all over the world who are based in our Copenhagen, New York, London and Barcelona offices. Our built work ranges from the most diverse urban playground and Michelin-star dining - to affordable housing and a school among the verdant fjords of the Faroe Islands. We are dedicated to maintaining a cool workplace, at becoming better and better at what we do. Read more about us on Big.dk

HiringOrg.Name: B.I.G. BJARKE INGELS GROUP ApS
HiringOrg.Description: BIG is a group of 500+ architects, engineers, urbanists, inventors, researchers and business minds from all over the world who are based in our Copenhagen, New York, London and Barcelona offices. Our built work ranges from the most diverse urban playground and Michelin-star dining - to affordable housing and a school among the verdant fjords of the Faroe Islands. We are dedicated to maintaining a cool workplace, at becoming better and better at what we do. Read more about us on Big.dk

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Business Development Coordinator for Bjarke Ingels Group - BIG
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Our Copenhagen office is looking for a Business Development Coordinator, Nordics, native speaker at least one Scandinavian language (Danish, Swedish or Norwegian).

As part of the Business Development Team, your primary focus is to support our activities in the Nordic market, by proactively seeking new and interesting project opportunities, maintaining and gaining new relevant contacts and in all ways seek to support BIG’s business strategy within the Nordic marked.

The role includes great personal development potential in an international creative environment where the level of ambition is high.

Primary areas of responsibility

  • Support the Business Development team, including the BIG Partners
  • Produce PQ applications for public tenders 
  • Develop new and maintain existing client, consultant, and collaborator relations
  • Update and maintain marketing material, copy, and design for web and print
  • Assist in maintaining a clear overview of business-related inquires
  • Initial assessment of potential new projects
  • Lead marked research for public tenders in Scandinavia
  • Lead market research projects
  • Maintain databases
  • Prepare regular status updates
  • Coordinate and guide office- and project tours for potential clients, consultants and collaborators

We are looking for a person who

  • Has experience from a similar position, ideally within the Architecture/Constructing industry
  • Is expert in MS Office and Adobe CS (especially InDesign), experience with CMS Client Management Software is a plus
  • Fluent in at least one Nordic language (Danish, Swedish, Norwegian) and English
  • Has excellent communication and organizational skills
  • Has an interest and knowledge of market research

Interviews are conducted on an on-going basis.
